comments.body:
I have two minor suggestions for improving readability:
* Put the entries in the same order as the name suggests.
* Expand the pair with explicit field names (e.g., `logEntryKey`, `logEntryValue`).

diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,12 @@

+
+package com.daml.ledger.validator.preexecution
+
+import com.daml.ledger.participant.state.kvutils.Bytes
+import com.daml.ledger.validator.SubmissionValidator.RawKeyValuePairs
+
+/**
+  * A key value pair with the log entry.
+  */
+case class RawKeyValuePairsWithLogEntry(logEntry: (Bytes, Bytes), state: RawKeyValuePairs)
